dashboard.pleaseSelectARepresentative: Please pick an elected official above...
dashboard.name: Name
dashboard.restoreConfirmationText: Are you sure you want to do this?  You will lose any changes you have made.
dashboard.personalizeLetter: Click the edit icons below to personalize your letter, then print
dashboard.stampsInstructions: If not head over to %s to print one now.
dashboard.envelopeInstructions: Order a pack at %s to arrive quickly.
dashboard.printerInstructions: You may have to disable the Header and Footer in 'More Settings'
dashboard.grabAPen: Grab a pen to sign your letter!
dashboard.noTemplageMessage:
Unfortunately we do not have a template on this issue for this elected official at this time.
However, we encourage you to write your own letter about the issue.

If you want to submit a template to us, drop us a line at %s
dashboard.noTemplageEmailSubject: Missing template for issue '%s', %s state, %s level
dashboard.noTemplageEmailBody: Please write your template proposal below:
